page.title: 17Changing Times (3)
page.content: Erin James was born in a Hereford hospital and wore an identity bracelet on her wrist so she wouldn't get muddled up with other babies.Six hours after she was born,Hannah,Nia & her father fetched Erin and her mother from hospital and took them home by car. Her mother brought her to school when she was two weeks old.We helped bath her using baby bath bubbles instead of soap as soap would make Erin too slippery to hold.After she'd been dried and powdered we helped dress her in a disposable nappy and baby-gro and took turns to cuddle her. Now that Erin is three months old she has baby rice to eat and enjoys sugar-free drinks,a herbal drink made from fennel and a drink of rose hip & hibiscus.She is now trying to sit up in her baby bouncer.
